ogallagher.marketsense

Class MarketSense

  • java.lang.Object
    • ogallagher.marketsense.MarketSense

  • public class MarketSense
extends java.lang.Object
    Main program entrypoint for marketsense.
    Since:
    9 June 2021
    Version:
    "0.1.0"
    Author:
    Owen Gallagher

      • loadPeople

        public static <T extends java.lang.Runnable> void loadPeople(java.lang.Class<T> OnLoad,
                                                             boolean guiThread)
        Loads the entities from the person table to compile a list of known accounts.
        Type Parameters:
        T -
        Parameters:
        OnLoad - The callback to which the list of people is passed.
        guiThread - Whether to use the javafx thread for the callback.

      • loadSymbols

        public static <T extends java.lang.Runnable> void loadSymbols(java.lang.Class<T> OnLoad,
                                                              boolean guiThread)
        Loads all supported asset symbols from resource files: SYMBOLS_FILE_NYSE, SYMBOLS_FILE_NASDAQ.
        Type Parameters:
        T -
        Parameters:
        OnLoad - The callback to which the HashSet<String> of symbols is passed.
        guiThread - Whether the callback needs to be executed on the gui thread.

      • login

        public static void login(java.lang.String username)
        Set the current person according to the given username. If that person is not already in the db, it's first persisted. If there is already someone logged in, they are first logged out.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the person to log in as.

      • loadTrainingSessions

        public static <T extends java.lang.Runnable> void loadTrainingSessions(java.lang.Class<T> OnLoad,
                                                                       boolean guiThread)

      • logout

        public static void logout()
        If signed in, log out by removing the reference to that person object. Then, return to the login form.

                                         int maxLookbackMonths)
        Open a new training session using the parameters selected in the new training session form.

      • abortTrainingSession

        public static void abortTrainingSession()
        Abort the incomplete training session without committing it, and return to the dashboard.

      • commitTrainingSession

        public static void commitTrainingSession(TrainingSession session)
        Commit a completed training session to the database and return to the dashboard.
        Parameters:
        session - The completed training session.

                            boolean database,

        Run designated tests.
        Parameters:
        base - Basic test.
        database - Database test.
        marketSynth - Market sound synth test.
